RECEIVED
RADIO STATION
MEMORANDUM
M 2 8 5i As! 19b/
December 31, 1957
WILL & WIUC
UNIVERSITY 6E ILLINOIS
To* Harry J, Skomla
cc* Dick Hull# Jack McBride, Bob Coleman, Prank Schooleyt/^
Bill Harley, Jim Bobertson
Prom* Burton Paulu
Here is the final copy of my report on the two Board meetings.
Peel free to edit it if you think it needs further rephrasing.
This incorporates the several suggestions X got from the
people to whom I sent it. It is considerably rewritten as to
style, but the basic message is almost exactly as in the
original draft.
A Happy New Yearâ€”and a good January Newsletter!
BPsds
